casebody.data:
LEE & SIMMONS, Inc., Lighter Silk, Libelant-Appellee, v. CITY OF NEW YORK, Respondent-Appellant. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 20, 1928. No. 137. George P. Nicholson, Corp. Counsel, of New York City (Charles J. Carroll, of Brooklyn, N. Y., and William J. Leonard, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Maeklin, Brown, Lenahan & Speer, of New York City (Paul Speer, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
